mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_NAMES.AUTH_NAME, AUTH_NAMES.UNIQUE_ID FROM INQUIRY_BOARDS inner JOIN USERS_JOIN ON INQUIRY_BOARDS.USER_ID = USERS_JOIN.USER_ID ;
mapper.insert: insert into INQUIRY_BOARDS (INQUIRY_ID, USER_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_WRITER, INQUIRY_DATETIME, INQUIRY_ANSWER) values (#{INQUIRY_ID},#{USER_ID}, #{INQUIRY_TITLE}, #{INQUIRY_CONTENT}, #{INQUIRY_WRITER}, #{INQUIRY_DATETIME}, #{INQUIRY_ANSWER}) ;
